page.title: 13Health in Priors Marston
page.content: {General Practice.} Nearest doctors at Byfield Medical Centre (3.5 miles), hold a weekly surgery in Village Hall. { {Consultant & Specialist services. Available at the hospitals in South Warwickshire & Banbury. Consultants pay home visits as required. Very specialised services such as radio-therapy & cardio-thoracic surgery are provided in Coventry. { {Accident & Emergency Services.} Departments at Warwick, Banbury & Northampton. The 3 counties involved have an arrangement that the ambulance nearest an accident is sent. { {Nursing Services.} District Nursing, Health Visiting & District Midwifery are available.
